search.query: | inputlookup requirements.csv | eval tag="csv" | append [| rest /services/apps/local | search disabled=0 [| inputlookup requirements where required="yes" | table label ] | eval tag="rest" ] | stats count(eval(tag=="csv")) as csv count(eval(tag=="rest")) as rest list(required) as required by label | eval status=if((rest>0), "Installed", "Missing") | rename label as app | table app status
